description: This API allows users to update logistics tracking status information

update_log.change: Add 'city_code' & 'tracking_reason' request parameters and support EH Cross-Delivery channel logistics_channel_id update

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Request URL based on different logistics channels

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Unix timestamp used to validate the timeliness of the request (Required to be within 5 minutes)

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Access token with validity period of 30 min

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Generated unique identifier for system authentication

parameters.name: tracking_number
parameters.description: Order tracking number, might take place to prefix for seller online tracking info

parameters.name: city_code
parameters.description: Code for validation when updating logistics_status to 'pickup_done_local'

parameters.name: tracking_reason
parameters.description: Only needed when updating logistics_status to REACH_3PL_PICKUP_POINT

error_codes.description: The order SN does not exist
The parameter you specified is not found

notes: The API includes both common parameters and request-specific parameters. There are specific error codes and response fields defined. The documentation includes examples of request and response formats, though they are partially visible in the image.
